description: Redevelopment of the site comprising demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a new part 22/part 15 storey building (with  three levels of basement) comprising Office (Class E), Public House (Sui Generis), 66 flats (Class C3) and flexible Office/Community use (Class E/F2)  together with public realm improvements and other associated works.
